overview:
Survah is primarily a services based software development Company having its footprints both in India as well as the US. The word Survah derives its roots from the â€˜Sanskritâ€™ language. It means â€˜allâ€™, omnipresent, ubiquitous, extending to Infinity.

We have a plethora of experience in providing technical solutions and services across domains as Education, Marketing, Retail, Recruitment, Financial, Internet and Real Estate et al to global clients. We are also channel partners with product based companies in the US.

Our core strengths are in the area of Custom Software Development, E-commerce Solutions, Web Development, Legacy Applications Reconstruction, Project Recovery, Consulting, Enterprise Architecture, building User Interfaces and rendering high quality Manual and Automation Testing Services.

We, at Survah understand the dynamics of technology and business processes in the volatile global sourcing equation. Fortes, inter alia competitive pricing, rapid application development, quick response time, and cutting edge technology capabilities make us a unique compelling choice for customers.

As reflected by its mission statement, Survah is continuously in Pursuit of Positive Infinity.
